data.title: Derek Fisher Player Profile, Oklahoma City Thunder
data.meta_description: Get the latest news, stats and more about Derek Fisher on RealGM.com
data.text: Jun 26, 1996 - The Los Angeles Lakers selected Derek Fisher in Round 1 with Pick 24 in the 1996 NBA Draft. Jul 19, 1996 - Derek Fisher signed a multi-year contract with the Los Angeles Lakers. Jul 1, 1999 - Derek Fisher, previously with the Los Angeles Lakers, became a free agent. Aug 16, 1999 - Derek Fisher signed a multi-year contract with the Los Angeles Lakers. Jun 23, 2004 - Derek Fisher exercised an Early Termination Option to void the remaining seasons on his contract. Jul 1, 2004 - Derek Fisher, previously with the Los Angeles Lakers, became a free agent. Jul 15, 2004 - Derek Fisher signed a multi-year contract with the Golden State Warriors. Jul 12, 2006 - Derek Fisher was acquired by the Utah Jazz from the Golden State Warriors in exchange for Devin Brown, Keith McLeod and Andre Owens. Jul 12, 2007 - The Utah Jazz placed the contract of Derek Fisher on waivers. Jul 19, 2007 - Derek Fisher, previously with the Utah Jazz, became a free agent. Jul 20, 2007 - Derek Fisher signed a multi-year contract with the Los Angeles Lakers. Jul 1, 2010 - Derek Fisher, previously with the Los Angeles Lakers, became a free agent. Jul 13, 2010 - Derek Fisher signed a multi-year contract with the Los Angeles Lakers. Mar 15, 2012 - Derek Fisher was acquired by the Houston Rockets, along with a conditional 2012 1st round pick (DAL own), from the Los Angeles Lakers in exchange for Jordan Hill. Mar 19, 2012 - The Houston Rockets placed the contract of Derek Fisher on waivers. Mar 21, 2012 - Derek Fisher, previously with the Houston Rockets, became a free agent. Mar 21, 2012 - Derek Fisher signed a contract with the Oklahoma City Thunder. Jul 1, 2012 - Derek Fisher, previously with the Oklahoma City Thunder, became a free agent. Nov 29, 2012 - Derek Fisher signed a contract with the Dallas Mavericks. Dec 22, 2012 - The Dallas Mavericks placed the contract of Derek Fisher on waivers. Dec 24, 2012 - Derek Fisher, previously with the Dallas Mavericks, became a free agent. Feb 25, 2013 - Derek Fisher signed a contract with the Oklahoma City Thunder. Jul 1, 2013 - Derek Fisher, previously with the Oklahoma City Thunder, became a free agent. Jul 24, 2013 - Derek Fisher signed a contract with the Oklahoma City Thunder. Jun 10, 2014 - Derek Fisher retired from professional basketball. Jul 1, 2014 - Derek Fisher, previously with the Oklahoma City Thunder, became a free agent.
